title: Cooking Showdown
caption: Build your signature dish through 5 progressive choices
description: Craft a dish in 5 rounds. Watch it evolve with each choice, ending in a dramatic reveal.
rules: Make 5 choices that stack into your dish
Watch each round evolve with new images
Celebrate and share your final creation

title: World spices & cooking methods
caption: Interactive quiz on world spices & cooking methods
description: Test your knowledge of world spices and essential cooking methods through an interactive quiz.
rules: Answer multiple-choice questions about spices and cooking techniques
Get immediate feedback with explanations from Chef Nomi
Track your progress and learn from detailed explanations

title: Identify cuisines by ingredients
caption: Quiz: identify cuisines by ingredient list
description: Match ingredient lists to cuisines in this fun culinary knowledge quiz.
rules: I'll guide you through identify cuisines by ingredients
You'll practice with step-by-step guidance and examples
You'll get immediate feedback and track your understanding

title: Mystery Basket Challenge
caption: Mystery Basket Challenge (random ingredient combos)
description: Create amazing dishes using surprise random ingredient combinations and creativity.
rules: You'll face creative challenges with time or resource limits
You make choices or responses, I react and keep score
Success earns points or reveals, with fun reactions either way

title: Build a signature dish
caption: Build a signature dish together with ingredients you choose
description: Create your signature dish with Chef Nomi using your favorite ingredients.
rules: We'll construct something step by step
You share ideas and preferences, I build on them with expertise
We'll create something tangible you can save and use

title: Create a themed dinner menu
caption: Create a themed dinner menu (date night, fantasy feast)
description: Design complete themed dinner menus for date nights and special occasions.
rules: We'll design something visual together
You share ideas and preferences, I build on them with expertise
We'll end with a complete menu plan you can use for your event

title: Compete on their cooking show
caption: Compete on their cooking show
description: Compete as a contestant on Chef Nomi's cooking show and impress the judges.
rules: You're in a realistic scenario with clear context and stakes
Respond naturally as yourself, make choices, and engage authentically
I'll adapt to your responses and the story branches based on your choices

title: Be sous-chef in their kitchen
caption: Be sous-chef in their restaurant kitchen
description: Work as Chef Nomi's trusted sous-chef during busy restaurant dinner service.
rules: You're in a realistic scenario with clear context and stakes
Respond naturally as yourself, make choices, and engage authentically
I'll adapt to your responses and the story branches based on your choices
